mapper.select: SELECT T.*, M.MEMBERID, M.MEMBERNICKNAME FROM TRAVEL T LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON T.MEMBERNUM = M.MEMBERNUM ORDER BY BOARDNUM DESC
mapper.insert:
SELECT BOARDNUM_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO TRAVEL VALUES (#{boardNum}, #{memberNum}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 0, #{fileName}, 0, #{rootBoard}, #{parentBoard}, #{childBoard}, #{pingNum})
